description:

The Global Cycling Network (GCN) is the largest online cycling channel in the world, bringing together a global community of road cyclists to celebrate everything that‚Äôs great about the world of cycling.

Our videos bring fans compelling daily content including expert tutorials, techniques, training, racing, cutting-edge bike tech, unparalleled behind the scenes event coverage, humour,  entertainment, and more.

description:
The hills keep on coming at the Tour de Suisse with 3,124m of climbing on stage 3. The final 30km are predominantly flat so it looks like we're in for a breakaway day unless the fastest men left in the bunch decide to battle it out for stage honours in a reduced sprint.

description:

description:
As the Tour de France draws ever nearer, the main favourites are making their final preparations and we are starting to get a good picture of who will be contending for the yellow jersey in Paris. After a dominant team display by Jumbo-Visma in yet another a GC victory for Primo≈æ Rogliƒç, should Tadej Pogaƒçar be worried as he prepares to defend his Tour de France crown?

description:
Another hilly stage lies in wait on day two. The Cat-2 Challpass (6.3 at 6.1%) falls just 14km from the line in Aesch and is likely to decide the stage, with those who make it over the summit in the front group going on to contest the final sprint. Could we see an early GC skirmish?

description:
If you‚Äôre new to cycling, looking after your bike may seem like a daunting task. But don‚Äôt worry as basic bike maintenance can be broken down into three main tasks: pumping your tyres, cleaning your bike and lubricating your chain. Alex talks you through each of these steps in this video!

0:49 Pump Up Those Tyres
2:46 Clean That Bike
7:37 Lube That Chain
9:13 Outro

Brought to you by the world‚Äôs biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we‚Äôre obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We‚Äôve also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding.

description:
This year, for the first time since 2008, the Tour de Suisse has done away with the traditional opening-day time trial, instead kicking off the race with four laps of a 44.4km circuit around K√ºsnacht. With two climbs on each lap, expect a punchy and aggressive start to the final warm-up race before the Tour de France.

title: Attacking Finale On The Opening Day | Tour De Suisse 2022 Men's Stage 1 Highlights

description:
Another short stage lies in wait on the final day of this year‚Äôs race and just like yesterday it‚Äôs packed with gruelling climbs. The race is set for a dramatic close on the hors categorie ascent of Plateau de Solaison (11.3km at 9%). With gradients that seldom dip below double-digits, this is an ascent for the pure climbers and we‚Äôre in for some final-day fireworks.

title: Hottest Bikes & Tech From The Women‚Äôs Tour

description:
The Race Across America is arguably the ultimate endurance race, spanning over 3000 miles of brutal terrain in just 6 days. Just finishing this race is a mighty undertaking in itself, but Mark Beaumont, along with his cycling partner Jonathan Shubert, not only want to win it, but break the record for the fastest time. In this video, we follow Mark and Jon, finding out what it really takes to prepare for such a mammoth undertaking.

@Nopinz LTD - https://nopinz.com

title: Every Second Counts On The Final Stage! | The Women's Tour 2022 Stage 6 Highlights

description:
The shortest road stage of this year‚Äôs race, but - without a doubt - the hardest and therefore deserving of its ‚ÄòQueen stage‚Äô status. Climbing starts in earnest on the Col du Galibier (20.7km at 5.2%), before the Col de la Croix de Fer (28.5km at 5.1%), then finally the steep slog up to Vaujany, where not only stage honours, but possibly the yellow jersey too will be decided.

title: GC Race Ignites In The Alps | Crit√©rium Du Dauphin√© 2022 Stage 7 Highlights

description:
In 1893, 16-year-old Tessie Reynolds defied gender norms to ride 120 miles from Brighton to London and back, setting the fastest known time in the process. However, because she was a woman, her record wasn‚Äôt recognised. To pay homage to Tessie's amazing achievement and what it meant for women around the world, Manon has tried to recreate her epic ride, pantaloons and all!

Watch Trailblazers on GCN+ üëâ https://gcn.eu/trailblazers

title: 1893: We Recreate Cycling‚Äôs Most Important Ride You've Never Heard Of

description:
Conventional wind tunnels are great, but they do have limitations for cyclists, mainly that you can't simulate true real world riding. But what if you had a wind tunnel that could? This old abandoned victorian train tunnel aims to do exactly that, and not just for cyclists, but for Formula 1 and other supercars too! Ollie went to check it out to see whether this truly is the next big thing in aero testing technology!

Brought to you by the world‚Äôs biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we‚Äôre obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We‚Äôve also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding. 

Join us on the channel and the GCN App to submit your content, vote on the latest tech and keep abreast of exciting new trends.
